channel.title: [PI] Doric's Quest
channel.description:
0 posts 24 views? i knew this community was full of leechers
you can add it yourself

item.title: [PI] Doric's Quest
item.dc:creator: @CodeBest CodeBest
item.description:
@CodeBest wrote:

[quote=“Garbage Breath, post:6, topic:447509”][quote author=CodeBest link=topic=550404.msg4038778#msg4038778 date=1341415957]

Half of us in this community could add this quest without any effort lol, that’s why there was no replies.

thats funny, then why do I see help threads asking how to move npcs, how to make shops, how to spawn npcs, etc? and why half the community is also loading 700+ like fucking dumbasses?

@pasta
just go find it on google its on there
[/quote]

Because people who go to the help section and spam like maniacs barely know how to find the server tutorial section much less use the search tool.

As for this thread, it doesn’t make any sense. You post a tutorial, but you get mad when people use it and don’t reply saying “thanks”?[/quote]

i dont like lurkers and leechers

Read full topic
